text:
It must be hard to keep the regularly aired Carpool Karaoke skit fresh and new, but somehow James Corden manages it.

On Tuesday (July 25), The Late Late Show host called on musician Usher for help getting out of “the worst traffic” and into the carpool lane. They could have just zipped to the office, but instead they took a detour landing up in a parking lot where Usher instructed Corden on how to properly enter a club.

Usher’s top tip? Ditch the jazz hands, James!

That kept us pretty amused but, not surprisingly, there was more hilarity to come. The entertainers swung by the Hollywood Walk of Fame to visit Usher’s star. And, lo and behold, there were some scuffs. Without pause, the two got down on their hands and knees to shine it up.

If you want something done properly, do it yourself:

Following the cleanup, Corden ushered pedestrians away from the star bellowing, “Walk around the star of Usher!” Then it was back in the car for more dueting with a feverish rendition of the 2004 hit, “Caught Up,” and a frank discussion about the Usher’s attempt to eat a vegan diet: “I had some really thin sliced beef yesterday.” Umm, that’s really not how it works! Cue a heated debate about what it means to be vegan.

In between pit stops and rounds of friendly bickering there was, of course, more singing, most notably Usher’s super sexy “Yeah.” Yeah! We love it.

Is Carpool Karaoke still doing it for you?
title: WATCH: Usher and James Corden Shine Up Hollywood Star in ‘Carpool Karaoke’ Session
